title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Multimodal Expression-Based Language Education Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design instructional materials that effectively integrate multimodal resources (images, videos, role-plays, digital games, etc.) into language education.
Learners will be able to develop assessment tools that encourage learners to demonstrate language proficiency through diverse expression methods via project-based assessments.
Learners will be able to establish instructional strategies for operating classes using multimodal expressions even in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
